text: Young Woman at a Window is a 1925 oil on paper realist work by Salvador Dalí, produced in his youth. It shows the painter's sister Ana Maria, seen from behind in front of a window at Cadaqués. It is now in the Museo Reina Sofía in Madrid Luisa Cogorno, Gaspare de Fiore, Gianni Gobba and Marina Robbiani, « Dali », Regards sur la peinture, Fabbri, no 12, 1988. ==References== category:1925 paintings category:Paintings by Salvador Dalí category:20th- century portraits category:Portraits of women Category:Paintings of the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía Category:Water in art
title: Young Woman at a Window
